attributes.action: Make Bridgend bus station open there facilities for longer!
attributes.additional_details: Because the seasons are changing and the stations are closed early in the morning and late at night when quite a lot of people travel, those people are left then to be stood freezing or wet  maybe even both just to wait over half an hour for there bus whilst the bus station is closed!!
attributes.background: I would like places like Bridgend bus station to be open better hours that accommodate the bus users more whilst waiting for services !

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Local transport decisions are a matter for individual local authorities and transport operators, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.

If you are concerned about local transport decisions in your area you could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
